content: basswood hat by sarah rody sizes this hat has two sizes adult medium 6 5 in or 16 5 cm laid flat fits 20-22 in or 51-56 cm and large 8 in or 20 cm laid flat fits 22-24 or 56-61 cm it is difficult to adjust the length of this pattern other than the length of the ribbing you could omit rounds 24-27 to make it a bit shorter my finished hat is about 11 inches 28 cm deep unfolded materials yarn approximately 180 240 yds 165 220 m of worsted weight yarn for sizes medium large i used malabrigo rios this is a lighter worsted weight yarn 210 yd/200 m per 100 g if your yarn is heavier you might run out of yarn and/or have a larger hat if you are worried about running short of yarn you can opt for a single brim needles size us 6 4 mm needles or whatever size is needed to make gauge 16-inch circulars and double-pointed needles or your preferred method of medium- and small- circumference knitting in the round size us 4 3 5 mm needles or 1-2 sizes smaller than your main needles 16-inch circulars for knitting the brim ribbing gauge 20 stitches and 27 row in 4 in x 4 in 10 cm x 10 cm of stockinette using the larger needles pattern cast on 96 120 stitches using the smaller needles and the long tail cast-on or your favorite stretchy cast-on for ribbing join in the round and knit in 2x2 ribbing for 4 inches 10 cm approximately 30 rounds for a folded brim or 1 5 inches 3 8 cm for a non-folded brim or your desired length 2x2 ribbing *k2 p2* repeat until the end of the round change to larger needles and begin on round 2 the increase round of the charts or written instructions round 1 references the last round of ribbing the gray squares are placeholders for the increased stitches you will repeat the chart 4 5 times around change to small- circumference needles when necessary after the last round cut the yarn leaving an 8-inch 20 cm tail and thread it through the remaining 8 10 stitches twice weave in ends 1 written instructions last row of ribbing round 1 *k2 p2* repeat until the end of the round 96 120 st body round 2 *c3fp c3bp p2 rli k2 lli p2 c3fp c3bp p2 rli k2 lli p2* repeat 112 140 st round 3 *p1 k4 p3 k4 p3 k4 p3 k4 p2* repeat round 4 *p1 c4f p3 c4b p3 c4b p3 c4b p2* repeat round 5 *p1 k4 p3 k4 p3 k4 p3 k4 p2* repeat round 6 *c3bp c3fp c4bp c4fp c3bp c3fp p2 k4 p2* repeat round 7 *k2 p2 k4 p1 k1 p1 k5 p2 k2 p2 k4 p2* repeat round 8 *k2 p2 c4bp k1 p1 k1 p1 c4fp p2 k2 p2 c4b p2* repeat round 9 *k2 p2 k2 p1 k1 p1
